alert.note: Alert for White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 10 at 12:53PM PDT until August 10 at 5:15PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...THE CURRENT FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... ...A NEW FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH 11 PM THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of eastern Nevada, including the following county, White Pine County. * WHEN...Until 11 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of eastern Nevada, including the following county, White Pine County. * WHEN...From 11 AM Thursday morning through 11 PM Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
